timeline.bodyText: shouldn't we be able to set the backbutton via the theme since we don't have server-depending theming for the actionbar anymore?
timeline.author: AndyScherzinger

replies.bodyText:
@AndyScherzinger It's true
But there's a lot of modification. You need a dedicated PR refactor for that.
